title: An alarm to the priests, or, A message from heaven to forewarn them of the dreadfull day of the Lord which will suddenly overtake them, unless by speedy and unfeigned repentance they return to the Lord ... / by a follower of the Lamb, one whose eye sees the down-fall of Babilon, and waits for the exaltation of Sion, Tho. Ellwood.
author: Ellwood, Thomas, 1639-1713.
